name: Treat Yo Self
description:
Treat Yo' Self to some candy, but hurry up! Time is running out. Also don't let the ghost of an excuse to stop you from getting your sweets!

Arrow keys or AWSD to move

Spacebar is to dash/speedboooooost

Composer: Mako Ikeno mikenomako@gmail.com

Enviroment & Asset Artist: ix.camacho10@gmail.com

Character Concept & Asset Artist: Shiyi Yin - sy.yin3366@gmail.com

Audio Designer & Composer - Seb Boulton - seb.boulton@hotmail.co.uk

Team Lead & Programmer: Seth Funk - SnootySnootGames@gmail.com

Due to some git collab issues, our project isn't a complete game, but I believe there is enough there to showcase the extraordinary work all the team members did, especially the art and music department!
